scenarios.name: Create business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 name = SarahCareerCoaching slug = sarah-career-uc1 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 name = SarahOffice slug = sarah-office timezone = America/Los_Angeles status = active

scenarios.name: Create user identity for host
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_sarah_uc1 email = sarah.uc1@example.com name = SarahChen status = active

scenarios.name: Create host resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_sarah_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 location_id = loc_uc1 type = host name = SarahHost slug = sarah-host timezone = America/Los_Angeles host_user_id = usr_sarah_uc1 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false max_simultaneous_bookings = 1 buffer_before_minutes = 10 buffer_after_minutes = 10

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 name = CoachingServices slug = coaching-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create service
scenarios.prompt: insert into services id = svc_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 service_group_id = sg_uc1 name = CareerCoaching slug = career-coaching type = appointment visibility = public min_advance_booking_hours = 24 max_advance_booking_days = 60 requires_approval = false allow_waitlist = true status = active

scenarios.name: Create calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 name = SarahCalendar timezone = America/Los_Angeles slot_duration_min = 50 slot_interval_min = 50 pre_buffer_min = 10 post_buffer_min = 10 min_advance_booking_hours = 24 max_advance_booking_days = 60 status = active

scenarios.name: Bind resource to calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendar_bindings id = cb_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 calendar_id = cal_uc1 owner_type = resource resource_id = res_sarah_uc1 owner_ref_key = "resource:res_sarah_uc1" is_primary = true is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Monday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_mon_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 calendar_id = cal_uc1 name = monday_hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 1 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true priority = 100

scenarios.name: Create Tuesday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_tue_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 calendar_id = cal_uc1 name = tuesday_hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 2 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true priority = 100

scenarios.name: Create Friday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_fri_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 calendar_id = cal_uc1 name = friday_hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 5 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true priority = 100

scenarios.name: Create offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 name = CareerCoachingSession slug = career-coaching-session execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_uc1 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 offer_id = ofr_uc1 version = 1 status = published duration_mode = fixed default_duration_min = 50 min_duration_min = 50 max_duration_min = 50 duration_step_min = 10 base_price_minor = 15000 currency = USD

scenarios.name: Create booking order
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_orders id = bo_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 offer_id = ofr_uc1 offer_version_id = ov_uc1 status = draft currency = USD subtotal_minor = 15000 total_minor = 15000 requested_start_at = 2026-02-25T14:00:00Z requested_end_at = 2026-02-25T14:50:00Z

scenarios.name: Create booking order line
scenarios.prompt: insert into booking_order_lines id = bol_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 booking_order_id = bo_uc1_001 line_type = offer_base label = CareerCoaching quantity = 1 unit_amount_minor = 15000 line_total_minor = 15000

scenarios.name: Confirm booking
scenarios.prompt: update booking_orders set status = confirmed confirmed_start_at = 2026-02-25T14:00:00Z confirmed_end_at = 2026-02-25T14:50:00Z where id = bo_uc1_001 and biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1

scenarios.name: Create fulfillment unit
scenarios.prompt: insert into fulfillment_units id = fu_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 booking_order_id = bo_uc1_001 kind = service_task status = planned planned_start_at = 2026-02-25T14:00:00Z planned_end_at = 2026-02-25T14:50:00Z

scenarios.name: Assign host and add private note
scenarios.prompt: insert into fulfillment_assignments id = fa_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 fulfillment_unit_id = fu_uc1_001 resource_id = res_sarah_uc1 status = confirmed starts_at = 2026-02-25T14:00:00Z ends_at = 2026-02-25T14:50:00Z

scenarios.name: Add private booking note
scenarios.prompt: insert into notes id = note_uc1_001 biz_id = biz_solo_consultant_uc1 target_type = booking_order booking_order_id = bo_uc1_001 visibility = private status = active source_type = user body = client_prefers_calm_room
